CustomField.formula: ServiceStreet__c + ' ' + ServiceHouseNo__c + IF(ISNULL(ServiceHouseNoExt__c), '', ' ' + ServiceHouseNoExt__c) + IF(ISNULL(ServiceAddressExt__c), '', BR() + ServiceAddressExt__c) + ServicePostalCode__c + ' ' + ServiceCity__c + IF(ISNULL(ServiceCityExt__c), '', ' ' + ServiceCityExt__c)
CustomField.label: Serviceadresse
